Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily experience. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than just a casual glance. Considering its quality and the effort put into its creation, I propose a price of $120 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we aim to bring to our esteemed customers like yourself. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
